name: A Awkward Dating Sim
description:
( NOTE, THIS GAME IS SATIRE!!! I tried to make a game based off cringy Wattpad fanfictions. DO NOT take this game seriously!! )

 You are a broke college student sick of writing essays every week. You wish you could get away from the real world! Oh my, it seemed your wish came true as you are somehow transported to a fictional world? All your fav fictional characters and furry friends are here and they are ready to pursue your love!

( Y/N is portrayed as a girl🤪 ) 

Also please excuse the grammar mistakes I made PLEASE  💀
